item.description:
We will be sharing links to members websites and planning for our upcoming event.

This meetup will repeat the first Sunday of every month at 3pm.

We will also discuss the planning of a group podcast.

We will talk about our group website located at http://fashionandmusic2010.info

and will exchange ideas about adding content to our website.

Email Evan your Skype screename if you RSVP Yes.

If you do not have Skype and need technical assistance downloading Skype-email

Evan and he will assist you.
item.how_to_find_us: Email Evan with your skype screename
item.name: Fashion and Music Networking on Skype
